info.description: Interact with Saferwall Malware Analysis Platform
info.title: Saferwall Web API

post.description: Users logins by username and password.

delete.description: Delete the cookie used for authentication.

post.description: Update the password from the auth token received in email.
post.summary: Create a new password from a token received in email

post.description: Request a reset password for anonymous users.
post.summary: Reset password for non-logged users by email

get.description: Verify the JWT token received during account creation.

parameters.description: JWT token generated for account creation
parameters.name: token

get.summary: Retrieves a pagined list of files

post.summary: Submit a new file for scanning

get.description: Retrieves the content of a file report.

put.description: Replace a file report with a new report

patch.description: Patch a portion of a file report.

get.description: List of comments for a given file.
get.summary: Returns a paginated list of file comments

get.description: Download a binary file. Files are in zip format and password protected.

post.description: Adds a file to the like list.

get.summary: Returns a paginated list of strings

get.description: File metadata returned in the summary view of a file.

post.description: Removes a file from the like list.

get.summary: Retrieves a pagined list of users
Get user information by user ID

put.description: Replace a user document with a new user's document.

get.description: List of comments by a user.
get.summary: Returns a paginated list of a user's comments

get.description: List of users who follow a user.
get.summary: Returns a paginated list of a user's followers

get.description: List of users a user follows.
get.summary: Returns a paginated list of a user's following

get.description: List of likes of a user.
get.summary: Returns a paginated list of users' likes

get.description: List of submissions by a user.
get.summary: Returns a paginated list of a user's submissions

bio.example: What really counts are good endings, not flawed beginnings.
